column4: chromium browser makes a stupid sound whenever one of its window buttons is clicked. could someone tell me how i could make it stop doing this?
open the sound preferences (applet in panel) and choose to not have sounds on.
i have already selected that... problem is, i use kubuntu (but have gnome installed as well)
without gnome installed, kubuntu does not do this. however, with gnome installed, chromioum browser and firefox both make these stupid sounds, even if they are turned off in gnome.
